content.title: Intro
content.content:
2004
Preceded by
2004
2005
Year
2006
Followed by
2006

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2005.

content.title: January
content.content:
4 - Humphrey Carpenter, biographer and editor dies.
14-16 - The One Ring Celebration.
? - Tolkien Gateway's IRC channel goes online.
? - Amon Hen 191 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
25 - Dutch translator Max Schuchart dies.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 47 is published.
? - Walking with Bilbo is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
11 - Cartographer Karen Wynn Fonstad dies.
28 - The parody book The Soddit is published.
30 - Unsung Heroes of The Lord of the Rings is published.
? - Amon Hen 192 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
13 - German translator Wolfgang Krege dies.
15 - Reconsidering Tolkien is published.
22 - Norman Bird, who played Bilbo Baggins in The Lord of the Rings (1978 film), dies.
30 - Interrupted Music: The Making of Tolkien's Mythology is published.
30 - The Forsaken Realm of Tolkien is published.
? - Tolkien Studies: Volume 2 is published.
? - Reconsidering Tolkien is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
3 - Tolkien Gateway opens as a wiki.
? - Tolkien's Ordinary Virtues is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
11-13 - Tolkien Thing VII.
12 - Der Berggeist is auctioned at Sotheby's.
25 - Tolkien's Mighty Pen is published.
? - Amon Hen 194 is published.
? - Mallorn 43 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
4 - 8 - Omentielva Minya - 1st International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages in Stockholm, Sweden.
5 - Perilous Realms: Celtic and Norse in Tolkien's Middle-earth is published.
9-10 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony plays in Herodion, Greece.
10 - The Tolkien Society Guide to Oxford is published.
11-15 - The convention Tolkien 2005 is held.

content.title: September
content.content:
16-18 - Oxonmoot 2005.
? - Amon Hen 195 is published.
? - The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Rulebook is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
14 - Bernie Zuber, author and artist, dies.
20 - George Sayer, friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
25 - The Tolkien Ensemble publish their fourth album, Leaving Rivendell.
26 - Scholar Angus McIntosh, pupil and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
27 - Tolkien's Modern Middle Ages is published.
? - The Lord of the Rings Sketchbook is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
8 - The Lord of the Rings: Tactics is released.
22 - Ringers: Lord of the Fans is released.
? - Amon Hen 196 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
25 - Reading The Lord of the Rings: New Writings on Tolkien's Classic is published.
27 - The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 48 is published.
? - The Art of Ruth Lacon is published.

? - The Ruins of Osgiliath is released.
Years
2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008
